title: Ian Kinsler
summary: Ian Michael Kinsler (Hebrew: איאן קינסלר‎; born June 22, 1982) is a former[1] American-Israeli professional baseball second baseman. He is also an advisor in the front office for the San Diego Padres. He played in Major League Baseball (MLB) for 14 seasons for the Texas Rangers, Detroit Tigers, Los Angeles Angels, Boston Red Sox, and San Diego Padres. Kinsler was a four-time All Star, two-time Gold Glove winner, and a member of the 2018 World Series champion Boston Red Sox.
